forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High around 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 50F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
